title: RS for the treatment of contagious diseases
MGV event
description: A site for this exciting event organized by Micro is also a series of attractive challenges, insightful conferences and practical workshops, covering a variety of visual arts such as 3DModeling, brands, video editing and Ui/Ux. **Micro Club** aims to contribute to the formation of a generation with the best skills necessary in our time.

title: Automatic TimeTable Generation
description: The graduation project was to create correct timetables for the Faculty of Computer Science using artificial intelligence and get rid of the traditional hard way. Using a genetic algorithm to generate ambiguity-free tables.

title: Ecommerce (Games, Cards, Console, ...)
description: My graduation project was to create correct timing tables for the College of Automated Media using artificial intelligence and get rid of a traditional method that is difficult. We used a genetic algorithm to create tables free of confusion. We also added the feature of requesting a class change or adding a class that occurs automatically by finding an empty section free time for the professor and students Only those concerned remain with the approval of the administration.
